Posts.Content: camd383 wrote: My mother is 51 she was diagnosed with breast cancer due to pain in her back her orthapediac ordered and MRI and found that the cancer had spread and was in her spine and neck....after an appt at the hospital they decided it was best she be admitted right away for full body scans. day by day she was told its basically in every bone in her body and she has either calcium deposits or more cancer on her skull. Im extremely worried I thought I had dealt with the worst having an alcoholic parent but this is just too much for me I am completely clueless I want to keep her safe for as long as I can but I don't know what to do all I can think of is her breaking something or having a seizure or someone figuring out whats going on and rob her in her hotel room, Im not even worried abou the drinking her sobriety is a non issue anymore I just don't want her alone.
